info.title: Workflows APIs
info.description: Workflows authors and executes experiences that allow non-coders the ability to define Simple Business Process without having to write code and to deploy them seamlessly without having to have development expertise

200.description: A JSON object of server information

get.description: Returns a list of workflow definitions' metadata.

200.description: Returns a list of workflow definitions' metadata.

requestBody.description: Request Body to create a new workflow definition.

404.description: The requested resource was not found

requestBody.description: Request Body to update a workflow definition.

404.description: The requested resource was not found

post.description: Publishes or unpublishes a workflow definition.
post.summary: Publishes or unpublishes a workflow definition.

requestBody.description: Request Body to publish or unpublish a workflow definition.

404.description: The requested resource was not found

get.description: Returns the list of instances for a deployed workflow definition.

200.description: A list of workflow instances for a workflow definition in the specified account.

404.description: The requested resource was not found

get.description: Returns the details for a specific instance for a deployed workflow definition.

200.description: Details for a specific instance for a workflow definition in the specified account.

404.description: The requested resource was not found

get.description: Returns a list of step history for a workflow instance

200.description: History of workflow steps is returned

404.description: The requested resource was not found
The requested resource was not found

get.description: Returns a list of configuration instances for a workflow definition

200.description: Returns a list of configuration instances for a workflow definition

post.description: Creates/updates configuration instances for a workflow definition. It will overwrite the existing configuration instances with the provided configuration instances.

requestBody.description: Request body to create/update configuration instances

delete.description: Deletes configuration instances for a workflow definition

get.description: Returns configuration instance for a step in the workflow definition

200.description: Returns configuration instance for a step in the workflow definition

post.description: Creates/updates a configuration instances for a step in the workflow definition

requestBody.description: Request body to create/update a configuration instance

delete.description: Deletes a configuration instance for a step in the workflow definition

LastDeployedId.name: lastDeployedId
LastDeployedId.description: deployed workflow definition metadata object id

SuccessMessageResponse.description: Returns success with a status message

ErrorResponse.description: Returns error with a status message

WorkflowDefinitionList.description: Returns a list of workflow definitions' metadata (0 or more).

createdDate.description: The date the workflow was created

lastUpdatedDate.description: The date the workflow was last updated

WorkflowDefinitionWithId.description: A DS workflow definition with metadata.

createdDate.description: The date the workflow was created

lastUpdatedDate.description: The date the workflow was last updated

createdByName.description: The name of the user who created this workflow definition

WorkflowCreatorId.description: The DocuSign Admin user Id who has the ability to create workflow definitions.

WorkflowInstanceState.description: Current Workflow Instance state (completed, failed, In-progress)

WorkflowInstance.description: Details of a Workflow Instance triggered for a Workflow Definition

instanceName.description: The friendly name of the particular workflow instance

users.description: Contains the list of Users and Steps mapping

startDate.description: Track the Start time of the Workflow Instance

endDate.description: Track the End time of the Workflow Instance

StartedByInstance.description: The started by information for a workflow instance

startedByName.description: The user name of the person who starts a workflow Instance

ProgressInstance.description: The progress information for a workflow instance

totalSteps.description: The total number of steps for this workflow instance

completedSteps.description: The number of completed steps for this workflow instance

WorkflowInstancesList.description: Returns a list of workflow instances (0 or more).

WorkflowStepHistoryState.description: Workflow Step History state (completed, failed, In-progress)

name.description: The workflow step name where the error occurred

startTime.description: Track Start time of the error occurred

endTime.description: Track the End time of the error retry/processed

message.description: Error Message which shares more details

WorkflowStepHistory.description: Details (history) of a Workflow Instance Step

stepName.description: Name of the workflow step (DS Scope)

stepId.description: The Step Id of the workflow step in the workflow instance

startDate.description: Track the Start time of the Workflow Step

endDate.description: Track the End time of the Workflow Step

WorkflowStepHistoryList.description: Returns the history of the workflow instance steps.

resultSize.description: Total number of workflow step history returned

DSWorkflowVariableFromVariable.description: DS Workflow Variable from a Variable

DSWorkflowVariableFromParticipant.description: DS Workflow Variable from a Participant

DSWorkflowVariableFromStep.description: DS Workflow Variable from a Step

DSWorkflowStep.description: A DS Workflow Step. UPDATED DESCRIPTION FOR OpenAPI2.0 USERS ONLY: This object should be any of the following object models: [#/definitions/DSServiceStep, #/definitions/DSTransformationStep, #/definitions/DSDocGenStep, #/definitions/DSSignStep]

DSServiceStep.description: A DS Workflow Service Step. UPDATED DESCRIPTION FOR OpenAPI2.0 USERS ONLY: This object should be any of the following object models: [#/definitions/DSWebFormsStep, #/definitions/DSIdvStep, #/definitions/DSDocGenStep, #/definitions/DSSignStep]

ESignDocuments.description: ESignDocument Object. UPDATED DESCRIPTION FOR OpenAPI2.0 USERS ONLY: This object should be any of the following object models: [#/definitions/ESignDocumentFromPreviousStep, #/definitions/ESignDocumentFromESignTemplate]

RecordStringOrVariableOrTransformation.description: A Record of strings to Strings, Variables, or Transformation Expressions

StringOrVariableOrTransformation.description: Object stands for a String or a Variable or a Transformation. UPDATED DESCRIPTION FOR OpenAPI2.0 USERS ONLY: This object should be any of the following object models or types: [string, #/definitions/DSWorkflowVariable, #/definitions/DSWorkflowTransformationExpression]

NumberOrVariable.description: Object stands for a number or a Variable. UPDATED DESCRIPTION FOR OpenAPI2.0 USERS ONLY: This object should be any of the following object models or types: [number, #/definitions/DSWorkflowVariable]

DSWorkflowTransformationExpression.description: Transformation Expression object. UPDATED DESCRIPTION FOR OpenAPI2.0 USERS ONLY: This object should be any of the following object models: [#/definitions/DSWorkflowReplaceExpression, #/definitions/DSWorkflowToLowerExpression, #/definitions/DSWorkflowToUpperExpression, #/components/schemas/DSWorkflowLastIndexOfExpression, #/components/schemas/DSWorkflowIndexOfExpression, #/components/schemas/DSWorkflowSubstringExpression, #/components/schemas/DSWorkflowConcatExpression]
